items.name: Cloud Carbon Footprint
items.description: An open source tool that provides visibility and tooling to measure, monitor, and reduce your cloud carbon emissions.

items.name: BoaviztAPI
items.description: An open source API that provides environmental impact data for IT equipment, including carbon footprint, energy consumption, and resource depletion.

items.name: climatiq
items.description: A proprietary API that provides carbon emissions data for various activities, including cloud computing, to help organizations measure and reduce their carbon footprint.

items.name: Cloud Energy
items.description: A tool that measures and analyzes energy consumption and carbon emissions of cloud resources to help organizations optimize their cloud infrastructure.

items.name: Boavizta Cloud-Scanner
items.description: Boavizta Cloud-Scanner calculates environmental impacts of your cloud compute and storage instances. It combines real time inventory and usage data from your cloud account with Boavizta API to offer a view of your impacts on a given region.

items.name: OpenTelemetry Java Agent Extension (RETIT)
items.description: An extension for the OpenTelemetry Java Agent that provides energy consumption metrics for Java applications.

items.name: ResilioDB
items.description: A database solution designed to optimize energy efficiency and carbon footprint of data storage and processing.

items.name: aether
items.description: A tool for measuring and analyzing the carbon footprint of cloud applications and infrastructure.

items.name: Dynatrace Carbon Impact
items.description: A solution that provides insights into the carbon footprint of cloud applications and infrastructure, helping organizations reduce their environmental impact.

items.name: Elastic Universal Profiling
items.description: A profiling solution that helps identify energy-intensive code paths and optimize application performance and energy efficiency.

items.name: Kepler
items.description: Kepler (Kubernetes-based Efficient Power Level Exporter) uses eBPF to analyse energy-related system statistics and export them as Prometheus metrics.

items.name: KEIT
items.description: KEIT (Kubernetes Emissions Insights Tool) supplements the energy recording with Kepler with current CO2 intensity values and embodied carbon emissions.

items.name: EcoLogits
items.description: A tool for measuring and optimizing the energy consumption and carbon footprint of AI models during training and inference.

items.name: Carbontracker
items.description: A tool for tracking and predicting the energy consumption and carbon footprint of training deep learning models.

items.name: ZEUS
items.description: A framework for measuring and optimizing the energy efficiency of AI models and systems.

items.name: Green Algorithms Calculator
items.description: A tool for estimating the carbon footprint of computational tasks, including AI model training and inference.

items.name: ML CO2 Impact
items.description: A tool for estimating the carbon footprint of machine learning computations.

items.name: AI Power Meter
items.description: A tool for estimating the carbon footprint of machine learning computations.

items.name: Green Coding AI
items.description: This project aims to show how much asking an GPT uses in resources.

items.name: Power Hog
items.description: A tool for monitoring the power consumption of desktop applications.

items.name: Watt Wiser
items.description: A desktop software energy consumption estimation tool built as part of the [Watt-Wise Game Jam](https://wattwise.games/). Usable for simple energy estimation and benchmarking on Linux, macOS, and Windows.

items.name: Android Power Profiler
items.description: A tool for profiling the power consumption of Android applications.

items.name: Greenspector Studio
items.description: A solution for measuring and optimizing the energy efficiency and carbon footprint of mobile applications.

items.name: PowDroid
items.description: An open-source tool for measuring the power consumption of Android applications.

items.name: Android Runner
items.description: Android Runner (AR) is a tool for automatically executing measurement-based experiments on native and web apps running on Android devices.

items.name: Eco CI
items.description: A tool for measuring and optimizing the carbon footprint of CI pipelines.

items.name: Green Metrics Tool
items.description: The Green Metrics Tool is a free open-source (FOSS) tool to measure the energy / CO2 consumption of container-based software applications.

items.name: GreenFrame
items.description: A tool for measuring and analyzing the carbon footprint of web applications.

items.name: Cardamon
items.description: A tool for measuring the energy consumption and carbon footprint of software applications.

items.name: LIMo
items.description: A lightweight monitoring tool for measuring the energy consumption of microservices.

items.name: Impact Framework
items.description: A framework for modeling and analyzing the environmental impact of software systems.

items.name: Scaphandre
items.description: A monitoring agent dedicated to energy consumption metrics.

items.name: powerletrics
items.description: PowerLetrics is an open-source framework designed to monitor and analyze power consumption metrics at the process level on Linux. Similar to how top displays memory or CPU time, PowerLetrics provides the "Energy Footprint" of each process in real-time.

items.name: Powerstat
items.description: A tool for measuring the power consumption of a system over time.

items.name: Perf
items.description: A performance analysis tool for Linux that can be used to measure energy consumption.

items.name: Turbostat
items.description: A tool for reporting processor frequency and idle statistics.

items.name: NVIDIA SMI
items.description: A tool for monitoring and managing NVIDIA GPUs, including power consumption.

items.name: Intel PCM
items.description: A tool for monitoring performance and energy metrics for Intel processors.

items.name: PowerTOP
items.description: A tool for diagnosing issues with power consumption and power management.

items.name: Tracarbon
items.description: A tool for tracking the carbon footprint of software applications.

items.name: CPU Energy Meter
items.description: CPU Energy Meter is a Linux tool that allows to monitor power consumption of Intel CPUs at fine time granularities (few tens of milliseconds).

items.name: GreenIT-Analysis
items.description: A browser extension for analyzing the environmental impact of websites.

items.name: CO2.js
items.description: A JavaScript library for estimating the carbon emissions of websites and web applications.

items.name: Firefox Power Profiler
items.description: A tool for profiling the power consumption of websites in Firefox.

items.name: Safari Web Inspector
items.description: A tool for inspecting and profiling websites in Safari, including energy impact.

items.name: PyRAPL
items.description: A Python toolkit for measuring the energy consumption of Python code using Intel's Running Average Power Limit (RAPL).

items.name: JoularJX
items.description: A tool for measuring the energy consumption of Java applications at the method level.

items.name: CodeCarbon
items.description: A Python package for tracking the carbon emissions of compute-intensive code.

items.name: oaklean
items.description: A tool for analyzing and optimizing the energy efficiency of Node.js applications.

items.name: jPowerMonitor
items.description: A tool for monitoring the power consumption of Java applications.

items.name: DotNet-Counters
items.description: A performance monitoring tool for .NET applications that includes energy consumption metrics.

items.name: Coppers
items.description: A Rust tool for measuring the energy consumption of code.
